posts.post_content:
Hey Guys...

I am asking for help identifying this postcard. It is from the 1932 season and pictures Frank "Shanty" Hogan. I presume this was part of a team issue but I would like to know if there is a designation number for this postcard. 

Would also be curious to know an estimate of value for this item. Thanks in advance for any help.
It's a 1932 NY Giants Schedule post card. There are 22 post cards in the set. As for the value. I wouldn't know.
Nice. I just wish PSA didn't put on its stamp.

Thanks for the help, guys.  At the time I was considering sending this in, PSA was somewhere in their several million card slabbing backlog period, and I could get quicker turn around if I sent in going the sticker route, so that's what I did. I would prefer it in a slab. 

It is for sale, so if anyone is interested, message me. I will post in the BST section.
